body_html: Btw, I discovered that when I move my files from user_ops/ to kernels/ they compile fine. So it seems BUILD is using different rules for user_ops/ and kernels/, with the CUDA headers not being included for user ops.
body_text: Btw, I discovered that when I move my files from user_ops/ to kernels/ they compile fine. So it seems BUILD is using different rules for user_ops/ and kernels/, with the CUDA headers not being included for user ops.
body: Btw, I discovered that when I move my files from `user_ops/` to `kernels/` they compile fine. So it seems `BUILD` is using different rules for `user_ops/` and `kernels/`, with the CUDA headers not being included for user ops.
